statements: SELECT transcript_id, transcript_text FROM sentiment_analysis_data;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT transcript_text, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis_data ORDER BY transcript_id DESC;
SELECT transcript_text, support_team_feedback FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE support_team_feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT transcript_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis_data ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM sentiment_analysis_data;
SELECT transcript_id, CHAR_LENGTH(transcript_text) AS text_length FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE support_team_feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE transcript_text LIKE '%positive%' OR support_team_feedback LIKE '%satisfied%';
SELECT * FROM voice_transcripts;
SELECT id, transcript FROM voice_transcripts WHERE sentiment = 'positive';
SELECT id, transcript, sentiment FROM voice_transcripts ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT support_agent_id, average_response_time FROM support_team_performance WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transcripts FROM voice_transcripts;
SELECT id, transcript, sentiment FROM voice_transcripts WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY sentiment DESC;
SELECT transcript, sentiment FROM voice_transcripts WHERE LENGTH(transcript) > 50 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT support_agent_id, average_response_time AS response_time, satisfaction_rating AS rating FROM support_team_performance WHERE average_response_time < 20 ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM voice_transcripts vt JOIN support_team_performance stp ON vt.id = stp.id WHERE vt.sentiment = 'positive' AND stp.satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT id, transcript, sentiment FROM voice_transcripts WHERE transcript LIKE '%customer%' OR sentiment LIKE '%negative%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT transcript_id, transcript_text, sentiment_score FROM voice_transcripts;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM support_team ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM support_team WHERE team_size > 5;
SELECT * FROM support_performance WHERE performance_score >= 8.0;

SELECT support_team.team_name, voice_transcripts.transcript_text, support_performance.performance_score FROM support_team JOIN support_performance ON support_team.team_id = support_performance.team_id JOIN voice_transcripts ON support_performance.transcript_id = voice_transcripts.transcript_id;
SELECT * FROM voice_transcripts ORDER BY transcript_id DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_size FROM support_team WHERE team_size > 5;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM support_team WHERE team_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT transcript_text, sentiment_score FROM voice_transcripts WHERE sentiment_score < 0;
SELECT support_team.team_name, support_performance.performance_score FROM support_team JOIN support_performance ON support_team.team_id = support_performance.team_id ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisData;
SELECT transcript, sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT id, name, role FROM SupportTeamMembers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT transcript_text, transcription_date FROM VoiceTranscripts WHERE speaker_id = 1;
SELECT team_id, performance_rating, issue_resolved_count FROM SupportPerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_rating >= 4.0;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisData ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, id ASC;
SELECT transcript, sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT name, role FROM SupportTeamMembers WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT transcript_text, transcription_date FROM VoiceTranscripts WHERE speaker_id = 1 ORDER BY transcription_date DESC;
SELECT team_id, AVG(performance_rating) AS average_rating FROM SupportPerformanceMetrics GROUP BY team_id ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM voice_transcripts;
SELECT transcript_text, sentiment_score FROM voice_transcripts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT team_name, team_lead_id FROM support_team ORDER BY team_id DESC;
SELECT member_name, team_name FROM team_members INNER JOIN support_team ON team_members.team_id = support_team.team_id;
SELECT ticket_id, transcript_text, ticket_status FROM support_tickets INNER JOIN voice_transcripts ON support_tickets.transcript_id = voice_transcripts.transcript_id WHERE ticket_status = 'open';
SELECT * FROM voice_transcripts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT team_name, member_name FROM support_team INNER JOIN team_members ON support_team.team_id = team_members.team_id;
SELECT t1.transcript_id, t1.transcript_text, t2.sentiment_category FROM voice_transcripts t1 JOIN sentiment_analysis t2 ON t1.transcript_id = t2.transcript_id WHERE t2.sentiment_score > 0.7;

SELECT ticket_id, transcript_text, team_name FROM support_tickets JOIN voice_transcripts ON support_tickets.transcript_id = voice_transcripts.transcript_id JOIN support_team ON support_tickets.team_id = support_team.team_id WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT t.team_name, COUNT(tm.member_id) AS team_size FROM support_team t LEFT JOIN team_members tm ON t.team_id = tm.team_id GROUP BY t.team_name HAVING COUNT(tm.member_id) > 3;
